events: Lost their sibling Scilla when Menoldis was 1 and Scilla was 5.
Lost their sibling Meinoldo when Menoldis was 6 and Meinoldo was 1.
Lost father at the age of 11
Lost their sibling Hadewigis when Menoldis was 13 and Hadewigis was 2.
Lost their sibling Gheesen when Menoldis was 19 and Gheesen was 17.
Lost mother at the age of 19
